      Methods in logic with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Trick.addCard​(Card card, Player player)
      adds the given card to the trickCards.
      static boolean ClientLogic.checkIfCardPossible​(Card card, Card firstCard, PlayState playState, Player player)
      its is checked if the card can be played by the player depending on his hand, the first Colour of the trick and the PlayMode.
      static boolean ClientLogic.checkIfCardPossibleColour​(Card card, Card firstCard, PlayState playState, Player player)
      submethod of checkIfCardPossible.
      static boolean ClientLogic.checkIfCardPossibleGrand​(Card card, Card firstCard, Player player, PlayState playState)
      submethod of checkIfCardPossible.
      static boolean ClientLogic.checkIfCardPossibleNull​(Card card, Card firstCard, Player player)
      submethod of checkIfCardPossible.
      boolean ClientLogic.checkIfItsMyTurnAuction​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if this player is supposed to bet next, by combining the specific methods for the different positions.
      boolean ClientLogic.checkIfItsMyTurnAuctionForehand​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if the player is supposed to bet next if he sits forehand.
      boolean ClientLogic.checkIfItsMyTurnAuctionMiddlehand​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if the player is supposed to bet next, if he sits middlehand.
      boolean ClientLogic.checkIfItsMyTurnAuctionRearHand​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if the player is supposed to bet next, if he sits rearhand.
      boolean ClientLogic.checkIfMyTurnTrick​(Player playedLastCard)
      returns true if the played card comes from the player with the position, who plays before this player.
      void ClientLogic.checkWhatHappensNext​(Player playedLastCard, Card card)
      checks what happens next, by updating the playState, checks if trick/play/game is over and calculates the respective winners, also checks if this player is supposed to play the next card.
      Player ClientLogic.copyPlayer​(Player player)  
      void ClientLogic.receiveBet​(Player player, int bet)
      is called every time someone bets, checks if the auction is over and/or if this player is supposed to bet next.
      void ClientLogic.receiveCardPlayed​(Player player, Card card)
      called every time a player played a card, saves card, updates the inGameController and checks what happens next.
      void ClientLogic.receiveChatMessage​(Player player, java.lang.String msg)  
      void ClientLogic.receivePlayerDisconnected​(Player player)  
      void PlayState.setGroup​(Player[] group)  
      void Auction.setLastOneWhoBet​(Player lastOneWhoBet)  
      void Auction.setWinner​(Player winner)  
      void ClientLogic.updateBet​(Player player, int bet)
      updates the bet everywhere.
